blogs.title: My First Blog
blogs.body: So I finally created my own blog. I will be using this as a space to document all of my noteworthy learning and thoughts through my journey in web development. Thanks for stopping by!
blogs.author: Patrick

blogs.title: Upgrading the React Router
blogs.body: With React Router being upgraded to version 6, it feels much more intunitive to use. Instead of using strange words like 'switch', we have things like 'routes' and 'navigate'. I'll be happy if it doesn't change after this!
blogs.author: Patrick

blogs.title: Using React with Node.JS
blogs.body: This was a very interesting project as I learned how to have a .json file and ask React to fetch data from it. Data in the file is mutable as well so I can add items of delete them. Amazing!
blogs.author: Stephanie
